class.name: wxStaticText
class.description:
A static text control displays one or more lines of read-only text.

wxStaticText supports the three classic text alignments, label ellipsization i.e. replacing parts of the text with the ellipsis ("...") if the label doesn't fit into the provided space and also formatting markup with wxControl::SetLabelMarkup().

flag.name: wxALIGN_LEFT
flag.description: Align the text to the left.

flag.name: wxALIGN_RIGHT
flag.description: Align the text to the right.

flag.name: wxST_NO_AUTORESIZE
flag.description: By default, the control will adjust its size to exactly fit to the size of the text when SetLabel() is called. If this style flag is given, the control will not change its size (this style is especially useful with controls which also have the wxALIGN_RIGHT or the wxALIGN_CENTRE style because otherwise they won't make sense any longer after a call to SetLabel()).

flag.name: wxST_ELLIPSIZE_START
flag.description: If the labeltext width exceeds the control width, replace the beginning of the label with an ellipsis; uses wxControl::Ellipsize.

flag.name: wxST_ELLIPSIZE_MIDDLE
flag.description: If the label text width exceeds the control width, replace the middle of the label with an ellipsis; uses wxControl::Ellipsize.

flag.name: wxST_ELLIPSIZE_END
flag.description: If the label text width exceeds the control width, replace the end of the label with an ellipsis; uses wxControl::Ellipsize.

int.name: wrap
int.label: Wrap
int.description: Wrap the text so that each line is at most the given number of pixels, see wxStaticText::Wrap() (default: no wrap).
